pkgmetadata.longdescription: The NVIDIA Cg Toolkit. In this kit, you will find everything you need to help you take advantage of Cg, a high-level language for graphics programming. Cg will allow you to incorporate the stunning interactive effects into your DirectX and OpenGL applications. The components include: - NVIDIA Cg Compiler Release 1.2 - CgFX Runtime - Cg User's Manual - Cg Language Specification
